clues.text: Like its WWII battle flag, the Japanese Navy flag has a rising sun with these emanating from it

"He was made of snow but the children know how he came to life one day"
Song that ends with "Follow ev'ry rainbow till you find your dream"

rounds.comments: (Alex: That's a follow-up to our regular clue which is STUPID ANSWERS.)

rounds.text: As early as 1862, federal troops occupied this largest city in the Confederacy
